subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[provoke]]; to [[incite]]
# to [[bring]] something into the [[open]]; to [[make]] [[public]]
# to [[pick]]; to [[select]]; to [[choose]]
# to [[carry]] (something) on a [[shoulder pole]]
